name: places/ChIJZ-zTuQNZwokReV-NeE34wbQ
formattedAddress: 150 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 150 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
I am former employee and assumed this wouldn't be a difficult process, but it has been disastrous.

Since June 2022, I have had endless email correspondence HR personnel.

Some background:
Early June I forward documents to HR to complete my PSLF application. June 30th, the application was completed incorrectly; I noticed the discrepancy on the application July 12th and and alerted Aileen Torres ( whom made the discrepancy). She got back to me July 24th with no updates. As of today, September 6th, I have not received any emails from Aileen or anyone else in the verification department at Mount Sinai Hospital except from Benjamin Alder ( Help desk).

On August 25th, he was the only one to respond to my 5th notification to Aileen and other cc'd emails. He was not helpful either. Instead, emailed me to let me know " I spelled his name wrong."

As of this morning, my conversation with Benjamin was unsuccessfully with no resolution.

Overall, my experience with this department has been stressful.

originalText.text: Poor service, have called three times trying to get my onboarding approved. Everytime I am on hold for almost 20 minutes, talk to the same people and they are unresponsive and unhelpful. Don't explain what exactly is necessary to get my onboarding processed, I can never reach a live person.
